name: Volcarona
description: The Sun Pokémon. A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
